lead_paragraph: Qatar may create special courts during the 2022 soccer World Cup to deal quickly and "very gently" with alcohol-consuming fans who break the law in a conservative Muslim state where public drunkenness is prohibited, a Qatari official said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Qatar Considering Special Courts for World Cup Offenders
headline.main: Qatar Considering Special Courts for World Cup Offenders
